author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Giordano International Says ‍FY ‍Profit Attributable Up 15.2 PCT​​
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Giordano International Ltd:
* ‍FY CONSOLIDATED SALES IN 2017 WERE HK$5,412 MILLION AN INCREASE OF 5.2 PCT​
* FY ‍PROFIT AFTER INCOME TAXES ATTRIBUTABLE TO SHAREHOLDERS OF COMPANY WAS HK$500 MILLION, AN INCREASE OF 15.2 PCT​
* OF DIRECTORS OF COMPANY HAS RECOMMENDED A FINAL DIVIDEND OF 20.0 HK CENTS PER SHARE ​
* ‍OUTLOOK FOR 2018 REMAINS OPTIMISTIC​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
